legal-text:
Data stored by your navigator is for a local use only and necessary for the application. The data stored is never transmit to a third server. Your are the only owner of your data, so, you are responsible of the security of yours data.

The usage of cookies and similar mechanisms are essential to the application.
about-text:
DIAKÔLUÔ V ()

WHAT IS DIAKÔLUÔ ?

Diakôluô îs an open-source project in order to help memorize.

THE CODE

The code is by: The code is available on GitHub under the GNU APGL license.
You can report a bug or demand features on GitHub.
title: Title
number-columns-random: Number of random columns to show (other will be asked)
settings-updated: Updated, the page will regresh in a few seconds.
settings-sync-error: An error occur during the connection.
settings-sync-login-failed: An error occur during the authentification.
sync-share-link: Permissions of people who have the link
sync-error-edit-message: An error occur while trying to synchronise.
cookies-message: Cookies and similar mechanism sont utilisées are used for parameter storage or used for the storage of user data like number of test, number of victories... Data are stored by your navigatpr and are never transmit, stored and handle by external servers.
error-storage-c-message: Your navigator isn't compatible with the feature « persistent storage ». Data <u>could</u> be removed by the navigator at any point, for example if the system need more space. So, think to export your data before exiting.
error-storage-p-message: You have disallow persistent storage for this website. Data <u>could</u> be removed by the navigator at any point, for example if the system need more space. So, think to export your data before exiting and consider allowing persistent storage on this website.
error-import-message: An error occur while importing this test. Make sure that it is the right file. If the error persist, please report the bug.
error-export-all-message: An error occur while exporting tests. If the issue persist, please report it.
error-playable-message: This test isn't compatible with this page. Maybe it is missing column or data, edit it to fix that.
warning-erase-message: You are already editing a test. Do you want to lose all the changes and edit another test or continue editing the previous test ?
warning-lose-changes-message: Do you want to quit without saving, all the changes will be lose ?
delete-test-message: Are you sure to delete this test ? This action is irreversible.
column-string-trim-spaces: Remove useless spaces (start and end spaces)
export-warning-csv: This format doesn’t support all the features of the applications.
export-csv-column-name: Export the name of the columns
export-csv-column-type: Export the type of the columns
import-csv-column-name: Import the name of the columns
import-csv-column-type: Import the type of the columns
footer-diakoluo: Diakôluô web application - v
footer-source-code: Source code by Antonin LOUBIERE under license GNU APGL.
